item.description:
Inspired by c25k.com (couch to 5k) I'm working my way up to a 5k run.  I'm not a runner, and I know nothing about running.  I haven't run at all this year.  So, yes, I'm a beginner.

 

But I've got to start somewhere!  If you'd like to join me and work up to a 5K (3 mile run) this summer, join me at Gaudet School as we take advantage of their wonderful track.

 

Don't worry if you're slow - I will be too!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the guy with really short hair standing near the track entrance (behind the tennis court)
item.name: Slowly Working up to a 5K (3 mile) Run
